snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers added to their youthful core with a versatile big man by taking Australian Ben Simmons from Louisiana State University with the first overall pick of the 2016 NBA Draft on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers added to their youthful core with a versatile big man by taking Australian Ben Simmons from Louisiana State University with the first overall pick of the 2016 NBA Draft on Thursday.

headline.main: 76ers Take Australian Simmons With Top Pick of Draft
headline.print_headline: 76ers Take Australian Simmons With Top Pick of Draft
